commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas0a4ee5b"

diff:
"0a4ee5b fix for bug #396733:  add an access key for view.details patch=Ehsan Akhgari <ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com> r=sspitzer, a=mconnor
diff --git a/browser/components/places/content/places.xul b/browser/components/places/content/places.xul

+++ b/browser/components/places/content/places.xul

+#   Ehsan Akhgari <ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com>

 # either the GNU General Public License Version 2 or later (the "GPL"), or
@@ -276,7 +277,7 @@
 #else
                     label="&view.details.label;"
 #endif
-                    accesskey="&view.details.label;">
+                    accesskey="&view.details.accesskey;">
           </menuitem>
 
           <menuseparator id="addonsSeparator"/>
diff --git a/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd b/browser/locales/en-US/chrome/browser/places/places.dtd
index e90a90a7..9fa0167 100644

@@ -178,7 +178,7 @@
 
 <!ENTITY view.detailsMacOSX.label  "List">
 <!ENTITY view.details.label        "Details">
-<!ENTITY view.details.accesskey    "">
+<!ENTITY view.details.accesskey    "D">
 
 <!ENTITY view.addons.label   "Get View Add-ons">
 <!ENTITY view.columns.label  "Columns">
